modalContent: Active, Always seeking adventure hiking, snorkelling, rock climbing and kayaking
Fluent Mandarin Speaker, enjoys singing terrible karaoke, reading books and ordering bubble tea (in Mandarin).
Lifetime Warriors Fan, occassionally watching cricket, rugby and basketball.
Uber competitive playing board games such as Cantan, Chess, Small World and Card Games
Travelled extensively all over Asia, lived in Taiwan and Japan for 4 years.
